summary: 2001 ACURA CL TYPE-S - TRANSMISSION FAILURE AT 28,900 MILES.  SUDDEN DOWNSHIFT WHILE TRAVELING ON HIGHWAY (I476).   CAR WAS IN FOR STANDARD SERVICE DAYS BEFORE INCIDENT AND THE DEALER FOUND NO PROBLEMS WHEN ASKED TO LOOK INTO THE TRANSMISSION SLIPPING.  7 DAYS LATER THE TRANSMISSION COMPLETELY FAILED CAUSING AN EXTREME DOWNSHIFT AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS WITH NO WARNING. DUE TO THE ALERTNESS OF OTHER DRIVERS - NO INJURIES OCCURRED..     *NLM
